content.question: In relation to the changes in vocabulary discussed in Harvard magazine in the third paragraph (“The evolving . . . medical practice”), the author’s comments in the fourth paragraph serve to

choices.label: consider the validity of the decision to implement the changes
suggest an improvement on the changes
explain the necessity for making the changes
challenge an assumption about a term that continues to be used

content.answer: challenge an assumption about a term that continues to be used
